headline: New Motley Fool Research Reveals the 10 Largest Consumer Staple Companies. Here's Which Dividend King Is Still Flying Under the Radar.
summary: Consumer staples makers are generally considered resilient businesses, but even Dividend Kings fall out of favor sometimes.

headline: Is Procter & Gamble's (PG) Baby Care Shift a Sign of Evolving Competitive Strategy?
summary: On August 29, 2025, Procter & Gamble received a shareholder proposal from As You Sow requesting additional reporting on plastic packaging, while the board advised voting against the measure at the upcoming annual meeting. This development comes as the company shifts its baby care strategy by introducing aloe-infused Bum Bum brand diapers made in China, aiming to compete with emerging imports and manage rising production costs. We'll explore how increased competition in the baby care segment...
